thunder-dragon-bhutan.title: The Land of the Thunder Dragon
thunder-dragon-bhutan.description: A 6-day immersive journey through Bhutan’s sacred valleys, hilltop monasteries, and peaceful dzongs from Siliguri to Paro.
thunder-dragon-bhutan.longDescription: Bhutan, fondly known as the "Land of the Thunder Dragon," is a mystical Himalayan kingdom where ancient traditions blend seamlessly with modernity. Nestled between India and China, this landlocked country is renowned for its breathtaking landscapes, unique cultural heritage, and commitment to Gross National Happiness—a philosophy that prioritizes well-being over material wealth. Bhutan's towering peaks, lush valleys, and picturesque villages create an ethereal charm that enchants every traveler. As the last remaining Buddhist kingdom, its deeply spiritual atmosphere is evident in its dzongs (fortresses), monasteries, and prayer flags fluttering in the wind. Bhutan offers a travel experience like no other—serene, enriching, and transformative.

Visit Kharbandi Gompa

activities: Visit Tashichho Dzong, National Memorial Chorten

itineraryDays.title: Thimphu to Paro – A Valley of Timeless Charm

itineraryDays.title: Paro – Hike to Tiger’s Nest Monastery

Visit Kyichu Lhakhang temple
Relax at Drukgyel Dzong ruins
Optional hot stone bath

itineraryDays.title: Departure – Paro to Siliguri via Phuentsholing

End of tour with farewell and memories
